4-Letter Words Part IV: Sins

August 15th, 2020

I finished the series of 4-letter Words from Resurrection Church in Aurora, IL and let me tell you; they don't shy away from the hard stuff over there. ðŸ˜³ I really appreciated Pastor Bryans preaching and he spoke what is probably my new favorite phrase, "I've read the book, we're not ok."

Step into the light daily my brothers and sisters. ðŸ™Œ
